data.title: Internet and others
data.description: For a long time I have been expanding my knowledge through numerous online trainings, programming workshops and an inexhaustible source of new information - the Internet. I regularly take part in WarsawJS meetups.

data.title: Warsaw University of Technology, Electrical Engineering Faculty
data.description: At the Warsaw University of Technology, I first studied at the Faculty of Electronics and Information Technology, after which I changed the faculty to Electrical Engineering. At this faculty I chose the specialization Automation and Computer Engineering. While studying at the WUT I learned the basics of programming.

data.title: Wrocław University of Science and Technology
data.description: At the Wrocław University of Technology I attended the Polish language study for foreigners, where in addition to the Polish language I studied mathematics, physics and computer science.
